mapper.select: SELECT n_id, c_id, title, content, origin, url, `level`, cnt, `date`, thumbnail FROM `NEWS` WHERE n_id = #{n_id}
SELECT n_id, c_id, title, content, origin, url, `level`, cnt, `date`, thumbnail FROM `NEWS` ORDER BY cnt DESC LIMIT #{start_no}, #{per_page}
SELECT n_id, c_id, title, content, origin, url, `level`, cnt, `date`, thumbnail FROM `NEWS` WHERE c_id = (SELECT c_id FROM `NEWS` WHERE n_id = #{n_id}) LIMIT 0, 10
